description:
This course will examine a number of artistic masterpieces from the Western tradition, ranging  from medieval Byzantine icons to contemporary installation art. We will delve deeply into each of the selected artworks, simultaneously examining  their extraordinary uniqueness and their capacity to represent an entire cultural epoch, both  aesthetically and conceptually. title: Masterpieces of Western Art: Renaissance to the Present
